title: Between the Scenes - The Story Behind Trevor's Knack for Accents
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - The Story Behind Trevor's Knack for Accents
description:
Trevor describes how growing up with his extended family in South Africa gave him the ability to speak in many different accents.

This podcast is brought to you by Wondery's new daily sports podcast, The Lead: http://wondery.fm/TheLeadDS

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
